posts.postText:
I will be gone for a couple of days, or maybe one. We're going to be going to Dallas, so I've got a good 13 hour trip ahead of me. (not because we live far, theres gonna be heavy traffic on the way) anyway, i'll be gone. 

I might get on steam while I'm there, or at least try to. But it's the holidays, gonna be with family. Don't want to be rude :P
Update: I will be leaving early in the morning on Wednesday. Aka tomorrow.
Byyeeee I'll miss you!! That is if you've played with me b4?
